DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Blue Cat Starter Face Painting Palettes (6 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Blue Cat Starter Face Painting Palettes are ideal for face painting at parties and plays. Includes 2 ml face paints in following Snazaroo colors: White, Pale Pink, Royal Blue, Pale Blue. Also includes a sponge applicator and a brush.
The Snazaroo Starter Kit includes Snazaroo Face Paint which applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the worlds safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily. Snazaroo Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Snazaroo Starter kit will easily paint 30 full faces or hundreds of cheek designs
Includes 2 ml face paints in following colors: White, Pale Pink, Royal Blue and Pale Blue along with a brush and a sponge applicator.
One of the most popular face paints in the world
